name: Deep Dwarf Soldier
movement: 30 feet movement speed, tactical movement for repositioning
description: A Medium humanoid soldier with rugged features and sturdy armor, wielding a War Pick and a Heavy Crossbow.
memorable: Utilizes tactical magic to enhance physical prowess and evade danger.
goals: To protect its territory and outmaneuver foes in battle.
relations: May be encountered with other dwarves or similar subterranean creatures.
environment: Often found in underground settings or dwarf strongholds.
strengths: Advantages against illusions and charm effects, good melee capabilities.
weaknesses: Limited mental capabilities with average Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma.
attacks: Melee weapon attacks with a War Pick, enhanced when enlarged; ranged attacks with a Heavy Crossbow.
most_powerful_ability: The Enlarge spell, allowing the soldier to grow stronger and deal additional damage.
senses: Possesses darkvision to see in complete darkness up to 120 feet.
skills: Fairly effective in Perception and Survival with +2 bonuses.
additional_information: Has a unique ability to cast spells like Invisibility and Enlarge.
Gains advantage on saving throws against being charmed or paralyzed.
Tactical Movement allows repositioning without provoking attacks.
Benefit from being near allies to enhance melee damage.
Durable due to good physical attributes.
spellcasting: Can cast Enlarge/Reduce and Invisibility once per long rest.

deep dwarf with high melee damage
dwarf that uses spells in battle
militant creature with strong resistance to magic
